article_title: Nurse Practitioners More In Demand Than Most Physicians

article_metadata.description: When it comes to what a hospital or health system needs to fill the vacancies in a medical staff, primary care doctors like family physicians and internists have long been the top need. But climbing the ranks and jumping past many doctor specialties on the demand scale aren’t physicians at all. [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
